unnormalised: Well, according to my history books (and a quick Google search, let's be honest!), India's first successful nuclear test, Smiling Buddha, happened on 18/05/1974. Makes you wonder what they were actually smiling about back then, probably celebrating finally beating the deadline which was preponed like 5 times. I bet someone got a serious dressing down if it was delayed 'til 19/05/74, right? Imagine the memes if Twitter existed back then! #SmilingBuddha #HistoryHumor #IndiaAtomics
